extendedInfo.description: Fantasy Football Now is the exciting new fantasy football game that can be played by anyone! Already have a game code?  Download and joint a Fantasy Football Now game here! Looking for a new promtional tool for your company?  With Fantasy Football Now you will keep them coming back for the next big game! - Let fantasy football increase your Business!  Once your patron register their team is instantly generated from a single live NFL game which makes playing quick, easy and fun. This innovative and captivating new way of playing Fantasy Football will keep your customers locked in for the entire sporting event!Fantasy Football Now is a powerful marketing tool that allows you to capture key demographic data from your customers.  By offering prizes and specials you will keep customers in their seats longer and most importantly have the ability to invite them back for the next big game.  Host a game today!It takes less than 1 minute to set up!
